Description: Papyrus fragment bearing 4 lines of Coptic text written against the fibres (verso), with clay seal. Mounted with EA 10130, 10135, 10138, 10142, 10453, 10457, 10459.
Curator's comments: Register says 'Found in some tombs in the hills behind Assiut'. Under study by Alain Delattre with a view to publication (updated March 2017).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380631) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380631)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Dr Gulian Lansing
